duties_responsibilities.duty: Running specific daily, weekly, and quarterly reporting for traders and analysts.
Preparing Commercial Paper Reviews and assisting with financial models.
Analyzing a company (or two) with a final presentation on investment recommendation to the team.
Assisting in sector coverage and direct interaction with company roadshows and/or Bloomberg representatives.
Preparation of investment performance commentary and commercial paper and credit reviews.

education_certification.credential: Working towards a degree in accounting, finance, economics, engineering, business analytics, math, statistics, or a related major.
Completed intermediate level coursework in finance with a 3.5 GPA or higher.
Additional exposure to investment concepts through involvement in student organizations or work experiences.
